languages.text: "Дела, дела... ты могла бы иногда просто приходить и говорить мне, как все прекрасно, Вигдис?"
"Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"
languages.original_text: "Дела, дела... ты могла бы иногда просто приходить и говорить мне, как все прекрасно, Вигдис?"

traits.locale_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Could you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful the things really are?"
"Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Could you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful the things really are?"
"Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"
"Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"
"Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi n'avez-vous toujours que des mauvaises nouvelles à m'annoncer, Vigdis ? Vous ne pourriez pas simplement me dire que tout va pour le mieux dans le meilleur des mondes, de temps à autre ? »
languages.original_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi n'avez-vous toujours que des mauvaises nouvelles à m'annoncer, Vigdis ? Vous ne pourriez pas simplement me dire que tout va pour le mieux dans le meilleur des mondes, de temps à autre ? »

languages.text: "Warum geht es bei Euch immer nur ums Geschäft, Vigdis? Könnt Ihr nicht einfach einmal zu Besuch kommen und mir sagen, wie wunderbar alles ist?"
languages.original_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum geht es bei Euch immer nur ums Geschäft, Vigdis? Könnt Ihr nicht einfach einmal zu Besuch kommen und mir sagen, wie wunderbar alles ist?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué siempre me da trabajo que hacer, Vigdis? ¿No puede venir un día y decirme lo maravillosamente bien que va todo?».
languages.original_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué siempre me da trabajo que hacer, Vigdis? ¿No puede venir un día y decirme lo maravillosamente bien que va todo?».

languages.text: “为什么你那边总有麻烦事，维格迪斯？你就不能偶尔只是和我打个招呼，说一切正常，没有任何问题吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"

traits.locale_text: “为什么你那边总有麻烦事，维格迪斯？你就不能偶尔只是和我打个招呼，说一切正常，没有任何问题吗？”

languages.text: 「いつも仕事の話ばかりじゃないか、ヴィグディス？たまには、ただ顔を見せて、何もかもが最高だと言ってくれてもいいだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"

traits.locale_text: 「いつも仕事の話ばかりじゃないか、ヴィグディス？たまには、ただ顔を見せて、何もかもが最高だと言ってくれてもいいだろう？」

languages.text: "Sürekli iş konuşmak zorunda mısın Vigdis? Arada sırada beni ziyaret edip her şeyin ne kadar da mükemmel olduğundan söz edemez misin?"
languages.original_text: "Why is it always business with you, Vigdis? Couldn't you sometimes just visit and tell me how wonderful everything is?"
